response.overview: \explores seldom seen ancient spaces â€“ megalithic dolmens and passage graves across the Iberian Peninsula. Using an experiential, first-person perspective closely connected to the human body, the thirty-minute film constructs a landscape where stone temples built by Neolithic people prefigure modern-day earthworks. Megaliths are pictured in surroundings that range from remote pastoral landscapes to urban spaces, underscoring the fluidity between past, present, and future.
response.title: Passage
